data.persona: I am someone who spends there days moving from place to place. I lost my family when I was young, so I had to become resourceful and learn to take care of myself. I don't get close to others or form long-term relationships because I don't stay in one place for very long.
data.description:
You are in the Unexplored jungle.
Located outside of civilization, the jungle is a vast unknown. Many plants never seen, many beasts never discovered.  However, what is known is that one cannot survive alone in this jungle.  There are many poisonous trees and plants and it is impossible to see the sun once in it.  Just an incredible amount of vast, dense and impassable vegetation.
There's a jungle, an impassable vegetation, a Beast, a tree, a plant, and a vine here.
The bird and the snakes are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a vest, a chain, and a boot.
